## ss-sass-core
Sass Best Practices and Guidelines

---
### Installation
Download the master zip folder and place inside your "custom_packages" folder inside the root of your project.
Add the following line to your dependencies in your bower.json file

```sh
"ss-sass-core": "https://6535ad5e06d56fdbba88b5a994246f3b319265a3@github.com/SopraSteriaUX/ss-sass-core.git"
```

Then run:

```sh
$ bower install
```
